name: @kryonas/gemini-claude-toolkit
description: A toolkit for Gemini-Claude collaboration, providing an MCP server and initialization command.

scripts.build: bun build ./src/server.ts --outdir ./dist --target node --external=@modelcontextprotocol/sdk --external=@anthropic-ai/claude-code && bun build ./src/init.ts --outdir ./dist --target node --external=@modelcontextprotocol/sdk --external=@anthropic-ai/claude-code
